short_description: rp3 agency is a digital & marketing agency based in bethesda, maryland, united states.
long_description: big things come in small agencies. we do what we love, and we love what we do. we are a small but agile team of go-getters, truth-seekers, storytellers, strategists, and big thinkers, using our collective talents for good. our solution-centric philosophy and growth mindset offer a fresh perspective and open up a world of new opportunities. shocked and heartbroken, our founder, beth johnson, made the bold choice to take the business on herself. over a decade later, our growing agency is a tight-knit team founded on integrity, commitment, and drive. we're living proof that hard work works, and are fully embracing a future chock-full of pushing the boundaries and building strong relationships along the way. prior to starting rp3 agency, beth led the growth of rosenthal partners from a three-person creative boutique into one of the region's largest, most successful agencies. nick has more than 20 years of marketing and communication experience in both in-house and agency leadership roles. jono is a performance marketer with 15 years of experience that's developed and executed media strategy for major brands like tiffany & co., kfc, party city, hhs, cdc, tumi, us navy, bluecross blueshield, aarp, frontier communications and more.

generated_description: rp3 agency is an independent creative agency based in bethesda, maryland. founded by beth johnson, the agency specializes in providing strategic and creative solutions across various industries, including financial services, education, food and beverage, government, health and wellness, hospitality, non-profits, infrastructure, and real estate. rp3 agency is known for its data-driven strategies, immersive storytelling, and multi-channel media planning. the agency is woman-owned and certified by wbenc and sba.
